channel.title: Note about Go Programming Language on Do sth. Slowly
channel.description: Recent content in Note about Go Programming Language on Do sth. Slowly

item.title: Go Programming Language Basic Syntax
item.description: In this series, I will list some notes about Go Programming Language syntax. 数组 初始化 指定所有元素 自动推断数组长度 b1 := [...]int{4, 5, 7} 指定下标 var a1 [100]int a1 = [100]int{2: 3, 5} 和 1) 可以混合使用 多维数组的初始化 var aa1 [3][2]int aa1 = [3][2]int{ [2]int{1, 2}, [2]int{4, 5}, } 数组是值类型，赋值会拷贝 数组支持 `==` 和 `!=` 操作 切片
